reviews.review: this is a good game

tf2 is ruined beyond repair. its a shit game now that is basically a dying cashcow for valve. the matchmaking system is utter shit, the cosmetics and skins ruin the aesthetic of the game. and ltierally every match is unplayable due to valves shitty servers lagging out or because it is always a shit one sided steamroll. the pyro is beyond repair op even stronger than the heavy atm and cheaters are everywhere aswell. not to mention the horrible and shitty contracts that are now forced onto everyone due to valves subhuman greed that dont even work 99% of the time and are tedious to even complete.

Also rubberbanding and shitty servers. Valve cannot even make a normal server system. Literally after every single update you get constant lagspikes from the server for no fucking reason making this game unplayable.

And finally the community of this game which consits of trannies, homos, furries or literal babies whom the former three try to groom truly the worst of the worst. They are all mouthbreathing redditfags who came onto this trashpile late and think that its cool to suck valves cock.
Gg

Giocato sul mio vecchio account per più di 200 ore si conferma, anche con gli ultimi aggiornamenti, essere uno dei migliori giochi competitivi online non solo sulla piattaforma Steam ma per l'intero mondo del gaming.
Team Fortress 2, forte del suo free-to-play offre ore e ore di divertimento gratis, uno dei più grandi pregi ?
Non è un pay to win!
Quindi non aspettatevi di perdere solo perchè un tizio a caso ha comprato 100 euro di pistola.
Tutto è solo skin, abilità di relativamente poco conto (Sopratutto quando si prende maggior fiducia dei comandi del gioco) e sopratutto.. CAPPELLI!
Inutili, belli e poco costosi.
Non servono a niente ma di certo ti strappano un sorriso anche se non lo indossi tu.
Ottimo gioco, mi ha fatto passare veramente delle belle ore di sano divertimeno!
No sólo este juego me vició por casi 1000 horas, sino que le agarré cariño a todos los personajes por lo bien hechos que están sus personalidades. Más que recomendado.
На мой взгляд классная игра, но читеры все портят

This has have to be one of my most favorite games of all time! It's a allot of fun, at times it can get a tinny bit glitchy but still allot of fun. There are updates, chaotic custom servers/game modes, and allot of great regular game interactions! it's CHAOS AND I LOVE IT!
Es de los pocos free to play, que no es pay to win, exelente jugabilidad, estable y con un perfecto multiplayer.

Damn...This review hurts but after revisiting this game after years...It's sad to see what's happened to it. Bots everywhere, Toxicity is through the roof, and tons of tons of glitches, along with a developer that doesn't care...? How could that be a game that you would recommend. Look, it's a great game at it's core, but it really needs to be rebuilt, same characters but more polish. Maybe have a new update for once. I only recommend the Community servers, because playing Casual may lead you to get kicked a shit ton because either you pointed out some toxic shit or you just get caught in the cross fire with the whole bot thing. Anyways, this game just isn't worth the time anymore, all it is t this point is a frustration camp, making you realize how something so great can fall so quick with developers who don't care at all.

After playing 271 hours, I see this game as a masterpiece of Valve's. I highly recommend this game.

To start off, I had never planned to this game, ever... So I guess take this with a grain of salt.

     I bought the Orange Box and recevied the Jungle Inferno DLC so I decided that I would give it a try. I went in with absolute zero expectations for it to be a good game. Somehow my first impressions were great! I loved the gameplay! It was fun to learn what classes worked well against other classes. Picking up a new class and figuring out how to use it and finding what I was good at was great fun. At first I didn't want to go online just so I could "git gud" before venturing out into the harsh unknown.

     About 7 hours of playing I thought that I had done enough to grant myself the ability to jump into a casual game. That was when everthing stopped being fun. Everyone took the game waaaay to seriously! I had kinda expected the anger of people that I wasn't good at the game or that they had been paired with a bad team but the amount of people that were angery that the LOSING TEAM was bad was insane! Two very specific players were going back and forth the entirety of the time I spent in the match. Now the reason that the teams were imballanced could have been because I was in a casual match instead of a ranked match.

     The overall vibe I got was a very toxic community that doesn't really want to admit new players. 

     So in conclusion Team Fortress 2 has really cool character design and art, fun gameplay, and a great class system. But the community is to self absorbed and toxic thusly causing any fun to be had online to be relegated to players that either don't care a single bit or have gotten very good at the game. I might revisit this game in the future but don't hold your breath.

     Thanks for reading, AShySkeleton :D
